title: What is the relationship between population and health? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rapid population growth and density is correlated the difference is complex they both deal with the patterns of health’s and illness in group of people rather than individuals measurement is an important aspect of evaluation in health care setting especially with respect to concept of investment

Rapid population growth and density is correlated with infections, such as tuberculosis and social pathology, such as schizophrenia. The relationship between health and fertility is complex, since in the absence of family planning, improved health decreases mortality and morbidity, and increase fertile life span.
